bibl.title: IG XIV 1184 and the Ephebic Service of Menander.
bibl.note: Presents a solution to a puzzle resulting from a mistake made in the inscription of a bust of Menander [I.G. XIV, 1184]. Menander died at the age of fifty (in his fifty-first year).
bibl.seg: DE MARCELLUS Henri, IG XIV 1184 and the Ephebic Service of Menander.
Presents a solution to a puzzle resulting from a mistake made in the inscription of a bust of Menander [I.G. XIV, 1184]. Menander died at the age of fifty (in his fifty-first year).
